description.value: ValueSet IMMZD2DTRabies for IMMZ.D2.DT.Rabies. Business rule: Determine if the client is due for a rabies vaccination according to the national immunization schedule Trigger: IMMZ.D2 Determine required vaccination(s) if any Table: Pre-exposure prophylaxis (PrEP), 2-dose scheme; high risk of rabies virus exposure
